channel.description: Python Comparators == equal != not equal < less than <= less than or equal to > greater than >= greater than or equal to Coercion x = 5 y = 5.0 print(x == y) Coercion x = 5 y = 5.0 print(x == y) True Strings a = "First" b = "fir" print(a < b) Strings a = "First" b = "fir" print(a < b) True Order of Operations Mathematical Operators Boolean Comparators not Operator and Operator or Operator
